name: Ryoji Mochizuki: Midyear Transfer Student
ability: 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, at the beginning of your main phase, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, and you have 3 or more 《Reload》 or 《Magic》 or 《Weapon》 characters, at the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: I'd appreciate it if you could show me the ropes.

name: Protagonist: S.E.E.S.
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 1 or less other characters, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put it in any position of your back stage.

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot be returned to hand or put into memory."
